1370: Engelbertus was born in Cromme straet in 1370.
Got married to Marie at age 31 in 1370.
Had a son with Marie, Vroeden, at age 31.
1371: Had a daughter with Marie, Mette, at age 32.
1372: Lost daughter Mette when Mette was 2 years old.
1373: Had a daughter with Marie, Natelien, at age 34.
1376: Had a son with Marie, Duker, at age 37.
1377: Had a son with Marie, Rembrandus, at age 38.
1379: Had a daughter with Marie, Emgelberna, at age 40.
Lost daughter Emgelberna when Emgelberna was 1 years old.
1382: Had a daughter with Marie, Truden, at age 43.
1383: Had a daughter with Marie, Clementia, at age 44.
